originalText.text: Dr Lamb is an excellent and caring Dermatologist . She listens to your concerns and gives attention to your needs. She is highly regarded by other doctors and very professional . I would not go to another Dermatologist.

text.text: Dr Lamb is an excellent and caring Dermatologist . She listens to your concerns and gives attention to your needs. She is highly regarded by other doctors and very professional . I would not go to another Dermatologist.

originalText.text: Dr. Lamb is highly competent and takes her patients individual needs and level of understanding into consideration when providing care, treatment and patient education. I have referred three close family members to seek expert care from her and my husband, daughter and sister in law were all satisfied with their care and impressed by her compassion and competence.

I have referred three close family members to seek expert care from her and my husband, daughter and sister in law were all satisfied with their care and impressed by her compassion and competence.

originalText.text: Dr. Lamb is an amazing dermatologist.  Kind, gentle and thorough.  She listens carefully and I feel very taken care of by her and her staff.  I can highly recommend her without hesitation.

originalText.text: I had a very satisfactory experience being treated by Dr Angela Lamb. She is personable and professional in her approach giving the patient confidence  and comfort during treatment.

text.text: I had a very satisfactory experience being treated by Dr Angela Lamb. She is personable and professional in her approach giving the patient confidence  and comfort during treatment.

originalText.text: Dr Lamb is a great listener, responsive  and always values/allays my concerns with her excellent and thoughtful explanations. She’s fantastic.
